summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2022/02/24 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} Review Text: My hair isn’t very thick, it’s maybe shoulder length, and i sometimes wear it up, but i don’t have too much hair so regular scrunchies and hair elastics are too much for my thinning hair. This small thing works great on my particular length, thickness and curliness of hair. You just twiddle the bobbles around each other, and it makes my hair look classier than i thought it would. It works very well because of my curls. I did used to used the bigger spiral hair ties from this brand when I had thicker, longer hair, but those are too big for the amount of hair i have now. This works perfectly though. It’s just right. Review Title: Good for my thinning, but very curly hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2022/02/26 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} Review Text: My hair is maybe shoulder length, layered, and thinning, and i can twiddle one these up into my hair with no issues. I feel like someone with thicker hair might struggle getting one in.

I really like them, as they give me a messy, sort of updo kind of look, without it looking like a formal ponytail. Which is impossible for me anyway, with my layered curly thinning hair. In fact the only way for to achieve a smooth head of hair is to use a flatiron and a ton of product, and i just don’t do that. It looks unnatural on me. I like these for the ability to look casual and unstructured. When i had longer thicker hair,i used the original invisibobble spirals, which were a game changer. These products do not tangle in your hair like a regular hair elastic often does. The products made by this company have revolutionized ponytails. Review Title: Perfect for short to medium hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grown Alchemist Anti-Pollution Primer (50ml / 1.69oz) Review Date: 2022/04/24 Store: Grown Alchemist Product Description: ['GROWN ALCHEMIST ANTI – POLLUTION PRIMER. A revolutionary lightweight detoxifying, silicone-free gel-primer absorbs instantly creating the ultimate protected, smooth surface; hydration levels are visibly boosted, the skin’s natural healthy barrier function is noticeably strengthened while wrinkles and pores are blurred to create healthy, flawless-looking skin. BIOACTIVE INGREDIENTS. Offering a blend of Bioactive Ingredients including: Anti-Pollution Shield Complex - A potent formula, Prebiotic-Peptide, Gel-Primer Base Complex offers a silicone-free base with skin hydrating properties and Ganoderma Mushroom Extract inhibits oxidation and inflammation which assists in the detoxification of skin cells. THE GROWN ALCHEMIST DIFFERENCE. Providing the most advanced natural cosmetic products, everything is formulated with the purest and highest quality active ingredients supported by scientific research and clinical results. Developed by a multidisciplinary team of skin scientists and nutritionists, GA has developed a unique, natural and holistic beauty system, combining both topical and ingestible skincare. SCIENTIFICALLY-INNOVATIVE FORMULAS. Grown Alchemist formulates products that represent a new evolution in skincare. Scientifically–innovative formulas are capable of influencing the way the body repairs and regenerates the skin. Through a holistic scientific approach, GA identifies the mechanisms that regulate the aging process of the body and skin. RELEASING YOUR TRUE BEAUTY. Grown Alchemist continues to challenge the status quo in the world of beauty, formulating ground-breaking anti-aging results. Founders Keston and Jeremy have stayed true to their promise to create advanced natural products that improve the health of skin cells, optimizing their function and ultimately, releasing your true beauty.'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Grown Alchemist', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '9340800005494', 'Manufacturer': 'Grown Alchemist'} Review Text: I was fooled by the look of this in the tube - it looked dark. So i was somewhat surprised when i squeezed some out onto my hand and it’s actually colourless.

Upon application, it smooths instantly into my skin, and transforms to a perfectly powdery finish, silky almost. Pores are minimized definitely, and it makes applying make up afterward, an absolute breeze.

I was using Tatcha Primers - i tried both their Liquid Silk Canvas, which is much lighter in texture than their Silk Canvas which i always found a little difficult spreading evenly.

This Grown Alchemist Anti Pollution Primer reminds me of a favourite i used - Benefit Porefessional, with a similar texture to that.

It does minimize my pores. It makes my skin feel great, and ml for ml works out cheaper than Benefit’s, so that’s a win win situation.

And whether i apply foundation or just a powder on top, both go on super smoothly, and nothing settles into the cracks.

I’m very much enjoying this primer. Review Title: Great texture Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Review Date: 2022/04/24 Store: Kopari Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} Review Text: Kopari, you have done it again.
Fabulous little set of Lip Glosses, super moisturizing and contain Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Squalane for those dry peely cracked lips.

They go on nice and smooth, just gently squeeze the tube, and a little bit comes out, but don’t press too hard. They look great over a Matte Finish Lippy, or just on their own, of the three flavours (grape, bubblegum, and strawberry) my fave is the strawberry, which has a reddish pink tint, but isn’t strongly coloured, and goes on sheer. It wouldn’t affect the colour of any lippy you were wearing underneath.

They aren’t sticky, and i no longer have long hair that clings to such products, so i can wear them without that happening anymore.

I like this set a lot, it’s a beautiful presentation, as are all Kopari products I’ve had, and could easily be gifted to any Lip Gloss lovers out there, of any age, in my humble opinion. Review Title: Moisturizing ingredients Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters Review Date: 2022/05/25 Store: OGC Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} Review Text: I’m going to go ahead and compare this to what most other people rave about as being a gold standard hair care product - Olaplex - which does nothing for my hair, and is expensive for what you get.

This is much better value for money, works better than “O” and smells nicer.

My hair looks soft, bouncy, voluminous, almost shiny (my hair never shines likes in the shampoo ads) and the frizzy back of it, is completely gone.
I must explain i have 2 textured hair - at the back it’s very curly, and goes frizzy, at the front, it’s limp and wavy, gets frizzy on the sides when I’m asleep, so for me, this stuff is great. My Mother takes one look at me on FaceTime, and immediately criticizes my hair, tells me it looks dry - i have to explain to her, that what she is seeing is my frizzy hair from having just woken up, or maybe it is frizzy from being dry, i don’t even know, I’m not a trichologist for heaven’s sake. But she did say that my hair was looking better when she spoke to me the other day.
It makes my curls defined, and my waves soft and silky. It fixes the frizz.
I’d definitely get this again. Review Title: Good hair mask Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AISI QUEENS Long Wavy Wigs for Women Dirty Blonde Wig Highlights Synthetic Middle Part Wig Natural Looking Heat Resistant Fiber Hair for Girls Daily Party Use 20 Inch Review Date: 2022/05/27 Store: AISI QUEENS Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Cartoon Character': 'Halloween', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 9.25 x 2.56 inches; 10.3 Ounces'} Review Text: I got this one for a bit of a glamour look, I’m a redhead naturally, but i liked the look of this ones beachy waves, and natural styling.
It is pretty realistic looking, and better looking than a human hair wig that i recently got. In fact the human hair wig looked very synthetic, whereas this looks quite natural on.

I always feel as though it looks noticeable at the front, but my neighbour told me it looked great, and not as noticeable as i was feeling it looked.

The thing is, for the most part, 99% of a wig is the hair part, with 1% for the hairline, and what are most people looking at? I’d say the hair.

So, while you can successfully lay down and hide, the lace front on a human hair wig, if the hair on that wig looks fake and artificial, then it makes no difference that you’ve successfully blended the hairline, if you’ve got brassy yellow doll’s hair on your head.

On this wig, that 1% hairline that i felt was so noticeable, is overshadowed by the really pretty 99% hair. and you could wear a hat or scarf on the hairline if you’re that bothered by it.

I had my husband try it on lol, he looked like a rockstar, and that’s when i noticed that the hairline is not nearly as noticeable as i thought, when it was on me.

So, I’m thrilled with this wig. Review Title: Better than some of the “human” hair wigs Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) Review Date: 2022/07/14 Store: YouClean Product Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'} Review Text: I have been buying these little soap dispensers with soap sheets in them for a while now (cos of the pandemic) and this pack is probably the best value I’ve ever had. I’ve paid $5 for one filled dispenser, with a generic scent one time, and i still thought that was a great thing to have. With this pack of 8 different scents, for less than $16, you’re getting a package for less than $2.
To say they are handy is an understatement. They are a Godsend. I don’t know how often I’ve gone into a bathroom, and the soap dispenser is empty. I was recently camping, and their soap dispenser in the toilets was empty during our whole stay. One thoughtful camper, left a bar of soap in a clear plastic cup, but it was a bit grimy with hairs on it, and i didn’t want to use that. With these handy pocket, or purse sized dispensers, you have a fresh sheet of soap each time. And they lather up very easily, as soon as they get wet.
They are small enough to put into the smallest purse, even your wallet, or pocket, and you’ll never be caught it out the ability to wash your hands.
These will last a while, as I’m not planning on giving any away. I might offer a sheet here and there, but not a whole dispenser for goodness sake. I’ll tell them where they can get their own.
I’m currently using the Tea Tree and it’s very fresh. I do feel very clean after using these, and will continue to recommend them to my friends.
Great value pack. Review Title: I’d give these 10 ⭐️ if i could Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL Review Date: 2022/08/09 Store: Beauty Bakerie Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'} Review Text: This review is for Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Metallic Lipstick in Rose Pose.
These Beauty Bakerie lip products are so beautifully presented, they come in a box, and there is an inner tube that slides out, kind of like a matchbox?
The applicator is a doe foot, which enables you to apply it easily.
The colour Rose Pose is way prettier on me than i thought it would be. Normally i like a creme finish, because for lighter colours that have a frost or shimmer, it feels old fashioned to me. Still doesn’t stop me hoarding them though lol.
I find this leans very golden on me, and less pink, and does look pretty metallic.
It stays on well, which is exactly why i got it. I hate re-applying lipstick.
This colour for me, is more of a summery colour, and goes well with the light golden and freckly look I’ve managed to acquire this year.

It’s pretty, long lasting, looks good with a gloss on top, i do recommend it. Review Title: Very pretty colour Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL Review Date: 2022/08/09 Store: Beauty Bakerie Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'} Review Text: I buy a lot of liquid lipsticks. (I love Jeffree Star’s formula best) and I exclusively wear them because of the longevity, i do not like to have to keep putting lipstick on. If you’ve tried a lot of liquid lipsticks, you’ll know that formulas can be hit and miss. Some are very flaky when they dry, some smudge. Some are a perfect consistency, and i can’t say I’ve found many of those. But this is one of them.

The colour is fantastic and looks amazing on my 56 year old freckly face. It’s a doe foot applicator, and is fairly easy to apply if you're confident with liquid lipstick. It’s richly pigmented, and one coat was enough.

I did not find this to be flaky when it dried. It did take marginally longer than some other brands, but once it dried, it’s properly smudge proof. It looks great as is, or with a gloss on top if you like that look. I have Beauty Bakerie’s Enchanted Jelly gloss, which is shimmering with iridescent fine glitter, and it looks awesome.

And now that Fall is coming, this is going to be worn a lot. I love it. I see more tubes of this colour coming my way. I’ll get anxious when my tube starts to run low.
And as with all Beauty Bakerie products, it’s beautifully presented, and makes your heart race just to receive it lol. Review Title: Probably my new favourite lippie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: L’ange Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 43MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel Review Date: 2022/08/12 Store: L'ANGE HAIR Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Color': 'Rose Gold, Black', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 2.64 x 2.56 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '810108191223'} Review Text: I’ve had many of these types of brush (with holes in the barrel) over the years. They really do help with air flow when your are blow drying your hair. I wouldn’t use any other kind of brush actually.

But this is my first experience with an Argan Oil Infused Brush, and i am impressed. It’s the perfect size to blow dry my bangs/fringe smooth and silky looking, and give it an impressive curl. I don’t blow dry the rest of my hair with a brush as it’s curly (i use a diffuser on it.) I have a longer section at the back that requires blow drying with a brush, to curl it under a little bit, and because I’ve just recently freshly dyed my hair red, the shine is superb with this.

It’s excellent quality, and yes it may cost a little more than your average barrel brush with holes, but in my opinion, the results are worth it.

It’s such a pretty colour, and very ergonomic and lightweight in your hand, and comes in a nice box, that it would make a nice Gift. Review Title: Beautiful brush Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.'] {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'} I buy a lot of liquid lipsticks. (I love Jeffree Star’s formula best) and I exclusively wear them because of the longevity, i do not like to have to keep putting lipstick on. If you’ve tried a lot of liquid lipsticks, you’ll know that formulas can be hit and miss. Some are very flaky when they dry, some smudge. Some are a perfect consistency, and i can’t say I’ve found many of those. But this is one of them.

The colour is fantastic and looks amazing on my 56 year old freckly face. It’s a doe foot applicator, and is fairly easy to apply if you're confident with liquid lipstick. It’s richly pigmented, and one coat was enough.

I did not find this to be flaky when it dried. It did take marginally longer than some other brands, but once it dried, it’s properly smudge proof. It looks great as is, or with a gloss on top if you like that look. I have Beauty Bakerie’s Enchanted Jelly gloss, which is shimmering with iridescent fine glitter, and it looks awesome.

And now that Fall is coming, this is going to be worn a lot. I love it. I see more tubes of this colour coming my way. I’ll get anxious when my tube starts to run low.
And as with all Beauty Bakerie products, it’s beautifully presented, and makes your heart race just to receive it lol. Probably my new favourite lippie L’ange Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 43MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel L'ANGE HAIR {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Color': 'Rose Gold, Black', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 2.64 x 2.56 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '810108191223'} I’ve had many of these types of brush (with holes in the barrel) over the years. They really do help with air flow when your are blow drying your hair. I wouldn’t use any other kind of brush actually.

But this is my first experience with an Argan Oil Infused Brush, and i am impressed. It’s the perfect size to blow dry my bangs/fringe smooth and silky looking, and give it an impressive curl. I don’t blow dry the rest of my hair with a brush as it’s curly (i use a diffuser on it.) I have a longer section at the back that requires blow drying with a brush, to curl it under a little bit, and because I’ve just recently freshly dyed my hair red, the shine is superb with this.

It’s excellent quality, and yes it may cost a little more than your average barrel brush with holes, but in my opinion, the results are worth it.

It’s such a pretty colour, and very ergonomic and lightweight in your hand, and comes in a nice box, that it would make a nice Gift. Beautiful brush
prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2022/02/24 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} Review Text: My hair isn’t very thick, it’s maybe shoulder length, and i sometimes wear it up, but i don’t have too much hair so regular scrunchies and hair elastics are too much for my thinning hair. This small thing works great on my particular length, thickness and curliness of hair. You just twiddle the bobbles around each other, and it makes my hair look classier than i thought it would. It works very well because of my curls. I did used to used the bigger spiral hair ties from this brand when I had thicker, longer hair, but those are too big for the amount of hair i have now. This works perfectly though. It’s just right. Review Title: Good for my thinning, but very curly hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2022/02/26 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'} Review Text: My hair is maybe shoulder length, layered, and thinning, and i can twiddle one these up into my hair with no issues. I feel like someone with thicker hair might struggle getting one in.

I really like them, as they give me a messy, sort of updo kind of look, without it looking like a formal ponytail. Which is impossible for me anyway, with my layered curly thinning hair. In fact the only way for to achieve a smooth head of hair is to use a flatiron and a ton of product, and i just don’t do that. It looks unnatural on me. I like these for the ability to look casual and unstructured. When i had longer thicker hair,i used the original invisibobble spirals, which were a game changer. These products do not tangle in your hair like a regular hair elastic often does. The products made by this company have revolutionized ponytails. Review Title: Perfect for short to medium hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grown Alchemist Anti-Pollution Primer (50ml / 1.69oz) Review Date: 2022/04/24 Store: Grown Alchemist Product Description: ['GROWN ALCHEMIST ANTI – POLLUTION PRIMER. A revolutionary lightweight detoxifying, silicone-free gel-primer absorbs instantly creating the ultimate protected, smooth surface; hydration levels are visibly boosted, the skin’s natural healthy barrier function is noticeably strengthened while wrinkles and pores are blurred to create healthy, flawless-looking skin. BIOACTIVE INGREDIENTS. Offering a blend of Bioactive Ingredients including: Anti-Pollution Shield Complex - A potent formula, Prebiotic-Peptide, Gel-Primer Base Complex offers a silicone-free base with skin hydrating properties and Ganoderma Mushroom Extract inhibits oxidation and inflammation which assists in the detoxification of skin cells. THE GROWN ALCHEMIST DIFFERENCE. Providing the most advanced natural cosmetic products, everything is formulated with the purest and highest quality active ingredients supported by scientific research and clinical results. Developed by a multidisciplinary team of skin scientists and nutritionists, GA has developed a unique, natural and holistic beauty system, combining both topical and ingestible skincare. SCIENTIFICALLY-INNOVATIVE FORMULAS. Grown Alchemist formulates products that represent a new evolution in skincare. Scientifically–innovative formulas are capable of influencing the way the body repairs and regenerates the skin. Through a holistic scientific approach, GA identifies the mechanisms that regulate the aging process of the body and skin. RELEASING YOUR TRUE BEAUTY. Grown Alchemist continues to challenge the status quo in the world of beauty, formulating ground-breaking anti-aging results. Founders Keston and Jeremy have stayed true to their promise to create advanced natural products that improve the health of skin cells, optimizing their function and ultimately, releasing your true beauty.'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Grown Alchemist', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '9340800005494', 'Manufacturer': 'Grown Alchemist'} Review Text: I was fooled by the look of this in the tube - it looked dark. So i was somewhat surprised when i squeezed some out onto my hand and it’s actually colourless.

Upon application, it smooths instantly into my skin, and transforms to a perfectly powdery finish, silky almost. Pores are minimized definitely, and it makes applying make up afterward, an absolute breeze.

I was using Tatcha Primers - i tried both their Liquid Silk Canvas, which is much lighter in texture than their Silk Canvas which i always found a little difficult spreading evenly.

This Grown Alchemist Anti Pollution Primer reminds me of a favourite i used - Benefit Porefessional, with a similar texture to that.

It does minimize my pores. It makes my skin feel great, and ml for ml works out cheaper than Benefit’s, so that’s a win win situation.

And whether i apply foundation or just a powder on top, both go on super smoothly, and nothing settles into the cracks.

I’m very much enjoying this primer. Review Title: Great texture Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Review Date: 2022/04/24 Store: Kopari Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} Review Text: Kopari, you have done it again.
Fabulous little set of Lip Glosses, super moisturizing and contain Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Squalane for those dry peely cracked lips.

They go on nice and smooth, just gently squeeze the tube, and a little bit comes out, but don’t press too hard. They look great over a Matte Finish Lippy, or just on their own, of the three flavours (grape, bubblegum, and strawberry) my fave is the strawberry, which has a reddish pink tint, but isn’t strongly coloured, and goes on sheer. It wouldn’t affect the colour of any lippy you were wearing underneath.

They aren’t sticky, and i no longer have long hair that clings to such products, so i can wear them without that happening anymore.

I like this set a lot, it’s a beautiful presentation, as are all Kopari products I’ve had, and could easily be gifted to any Lip Gloss lovers out there, of any age, in my humble opinion. Review Title: Moisturizing ingredients Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters Review Date: 2022/05/25 Store: OGC Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} Review Text: I’m going to go ahead and compare this to what most other people rave about as being a gold standard hair care product - Olaplex - which does nothing for my hair, and is expensive for what you get.

This is much better value for money, works better than “O” and smells nicer.

My hair looks soft, bouncy, voluminous, almost shiny (my hair never shines likes in the shampoo ads) and the frizzy back of it, is completely gone.
I must explain i have 2 textured hair - at the back it’s very curly, and goes frizzy, at the front, it’s limp and wavy, gets frizzy on the sides when I’m asleep, so for me, this stuff is great. My Mother takes one look at me on FaceTime, and immediately criticizes my hair, tells me it looks dry - i have to explain to her, that what she is seeing is my frizzy hair from having just woken up, or maybe it is frizzy from being dry, i don’t even know, I’m not a trichologist for heaven’s sake. But she did say that my hair was looking better when she spoke to me the other day.
It makes my curls defined, and my waves soft and silky. It fixes the frizz.
I’d definitely get this again. Review Title: Good hair mask Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AISI QUEENS Long Wavy Wigs for Women Dirty Blonde Wig Highlights Synthetic Middle Part Wig Natural Looking Heat Resistant Fiber Hair for Girls Daily Party Use 20 Inch Review Date: 2022/05/27 Store: AISI QUEENS Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Cartoon Character': 'Halloween', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 9.25 x 2.56 inches; 10.3 Ounces'} Review Text: I got this one for a bit of a glamour look, I’m a redhead naturally, but i liked the look of this ones beachy waves, and natural styling.
It is pretty realistic looking, and better looking than a human hair wig that i recently got. In fact the human hair wig looked very synthetic, whereas this looks quite natural on.

I always feel as though it looks noticeable at the front, but my neighbour told me it looked great, and not as noticeable as i was feeling it looked.

The thing is, for the most part, 99% of a wig is the hair part, with 1% for the hairline, and what are most people looking at? I’d say the hair.

So, while you can successfully lay down and hide, the lace front on a human hair wig, if the hair on that wig looks fake and artificial, then it makes no difference that you’ve successfully blended the hairline, if you’ve got brassy yellow doll’s hair on your head.

On this wig, that 1% hairline that i felt was so noticeable, is overshadowed by the really pretty 99% hair. and you could wear a hat or scarf on the hairline if you’re that bothered by it.

I had my husband try it on lol, he looked like a rockstar, and that’s when i noticed that the hairline is not nearly as noticeable as i thought, when it was on me.

So, I’m thrilled with this wig. Review Title: Better than some of the “human” hair wigs Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) Review Date: 2022/07/14 Store: YouClean Product Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. Great value pack. Review Title: Beautiful brush Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for high-quality hair and beauty products that address specific hair types and concerns, particularly for thinner, curly hair. They favor items that are multifunctional, with a consistent emphasis on products that offer ease of use, such as no-damage hair ties and effective primers. The consistent high ratings suggest satisfaction with products that provide value, durability, and performance.

Price sensitivity appears moderate; while they appreciate value, they do not shy away from investing in quality items that deliver results, as seen with their choice of skincare and hair care brands. A recurring theme is the need for moisturizing and frizz-control properties, indicated by purchases of both hair masks and hydrating lip products. The person shows a particular affinity for products that enhance their hair's natural attributes without complicating styling.

Additionally, the enjoyment of aesthetically pleasing and well-presented products is evident, especially in cosmetics, suggesting that packaging and brand presentation are significant factors in their buying decisions. Overall, the person prioritizes quality, effectiveness, and aesthetic appeal in beauty and haircare purchases, reflecting a thoughtful approach to personal grooming and self-expression.

target_interaction.title: Great Value
target_interaction.text:
This is a pretty little palette, small enough to use for traveling. Contains 12 pans of both shimmer and matte shades. Doesn’t come with a brush, but no matter, i have plenty of those. It does have a mirror though. The packaging is reminiscent of London, with the Phonebox, and Big Ben printed on the front.

The texture is very blendable, and the shades are very wearable. I’m not a fan of the “natural look” makeup, i like a bold eye, and you can have that with this palette. I particularly love the Red, Dark Blue, Gray and Black shades. And if you find that you want the red to look darker, you can add a bit of black into the crease, and deepen it. I always want palettes to have a black pan - it’s useful for other things like lining, and smoking out.

If you choose to use an eyeshadow primer (or even just a concealer or foundation) then the colour payoff is more intense. If you don’t wear a primer, you might need to add more on top. I always wear a primer, because it makes sure the eyeshadow stays on longer, and prevents it settling into my crease.

Essence have some very good products, i first bought their products way back in 2007, in a bricks and mortar store, and they were so affordable, and such good quality. And they have really upped their game, and expanded their range of products over the years. To be honest, i don’t really often buy drugstore brands any more, and it is a long whole since i shopped Essence, but when this popped up, i was drawn to it, like a moth to a flame, as i love eyeshadow palettes almost as much as i love shoes and bags.

I am not at all disappointed with the quality of the product, the price, and the cute packaging.
target_interaction.title_meta: essence | Welcome to London Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Matte & Metallic Blendable Shades | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Free From Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
features: TAKE ME BACK TO LONDON: Achieve the moody, posh London look using the essence Welcome To London Eyeshadow Palette. The bold & striking color palette is inspired by the city features and London fog.

12 HIGHLY PIGMENTED SHADES: The 12 shadows come in royal blues, bold yellows and striking reds as well as complementary hazy nude shades reminiscent of the London sunset. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion.

BEAUTY TIP: Using the essence eyeshadow brush, blend shadows seamlessly together across your eyelid. Use darker shades in the crease, and lighter shades along the brow bone and inner corners of the eye.
CLAIMS: Vegan & cruelty free. Free from animal byproducts, oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles.
CRUELTY FREE: essence cosmetics is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.
